verses.roman:
ataeva ei-līlā saṅkṣepe sūtra kaila
punarukti-bhaye vistārirā nā kahila

synonyms: ataeva—therefore; ei-līlā—these pastimes; saṅkṣepe—in brief; sūtra—synopsis; kaila—made; punar-ukti—repetition; bhaye—being afraid of; vistārirā—elaborate explanation; nā—did not; kahila—say.
translation: I have therefore made only a brief summary. Being afraid of repetition, I have not elaborated upon this subject matter.
